about_the_game:
Featuring a movement system that's as unforgiving as it is addictive, your gaming skills will be put to the ultimate test! Play through the entire first stage of the game. This one little area, known as "The Cave" is where Jeff lives with his mama. This area contains enough content to keep you failing for hours on end, or if you are lucky maybe just one hour!

Since you are a turtle, you move quite slowly. So, how does Jeff get around that? It's simple, he gets in his shell and spins around! The faster you spin, the further you jump. But, be careful! Once you start spinning you can't stop unless you exit your shell again!



Once you make it to the end of the demo, you get your final time. This is only for the demo, the full game has an actual ending, so don't worry! The full game also contains more biomes to be challenged in, being that it is one continuous world!
detailed_description:
Featuring a movement system that's as unforgiving as it is addictive, your gaming skills will be put to the ultimate test! Play through the entire first stage of the game. This one little area, known as "The Cave" is where Jeff lives with his mama. This area contains enough content to keep you failing for hours on end, or if you are lucky maybe just one hour!

Since you are a turtle, you move quite slowly. So, how does Jeff get around that? It's simple, he gets in his shell and spins around! The faster you spin, the further you jump. But, be careful! Once you start spinning you can't stop unless you exit your shell again!



Once you make it to the end of the demo, you get your final time. This is only for the demo, the full game has an actual ending, so don't worry! The full game also contains more biomes to be challenged in, being that it is one continuous world!

movies.name: I HATE MY LEGS RAGE TRAILER

name: I HATE MY LEGS DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Spin, Jump, and Zoom through the world as quickly as you can in this difficult-to-master Foddian adventure, embark on a hilariously BRUTAL mission as Jeff, a turtle with massive human legs going through his first challenge!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Vietnamese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
